channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road has weeds growing in cracks half the length of the road, there are many holes and a large dip!, 8th October
item.description:
Poplars Road, this is a bus route and probably damaged by the bus
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Poplars, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Roebock cottages end of Nailsworth terrace, 8th October
item.description:
The drain used to be functioning but neglect and silt has now blocked the drain so it is not even visable to eye. Blocked full of silt

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Milsom Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: A tent strewn up in trees the woods, 8th October
item.description:
It looks like it could possibly being used as a shelter by people smoking weed. Other rubbish strewn around
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Hayfield Way, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Abandoned caravan in layby, 8th October
item.description:
Abandoned caravan in the layby on the A435 Cirencester Rd out of Charlton Kings towards Cirencester. No number plate, looks dilapidated and has been in the same place for two weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cirencester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
